snippet: Exactly what tale of doings in the garret at Skerryvore had been related  to Stevenson (in the character of Robin Lewison) by his correspondent  (in the character of Miss Green) cannot well be gathered from this reply.

title: The novels and tales of Robert Louis Stevenson.
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: Another of the literary projects which came to naught, no one of the stories mentioned having turned out according to Stevenson's dream and desire at its first conception, or even having been preserved for use afterwards as the foundation of riper work.

title: The novels and tales of Robert Louis Stevenson.

snippet: I forget what the Japanese prints were which I had been sending to Stevenson at his wish, but they sound like specimens of Hiroshige and Kuniyoshi.

title: The novels and tales of Robert Louis Stevenson.
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: The strain of anxiety recorded in the two last letters had given a shake to Stevenson's own health, and it was agreed that he should go for a yachting tour with Sir Walter Simpson in the Inner Hebrides.
